section.name: Estimated Package Size Calculation

field.note: This value will be added to the estimated package size to account for the cover page of the package.
This value will be added to the estimated package size for each unique licence to cover the summary page.
Packages that are larger than this threshold will receive a warning message before being allowed to confirm their package.

section.note: An estimated size will be calculated for each package sent through BLIS. The sizes of the licence files that are stored on BLIS (external PDFs are not counted) are combined along with an estimate for the cover page, plus an estimate for the licence summary (one for each licence).
